arts.ttl: Ipswich Town vs Southampton – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Ipswich Town and Southampton go head-to-head in the Sky Bet Championship at Portman Road on Sunday. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to their respective campaigns in this eagerly anticipated clash between two relegated Premier League outfits. arts.ttl: Southampton XI vs Ipswich – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Southampton continue their Championship season with a trip to face Ipswich Town at Portman Road on Sunday. Southampton arrive having secured a dramatic 2-1 turnaround against newly-promoted Wrexham at St Mary’s, overturning a first-half deficit with two late goals to claim victory.
